title: YOU'RE ON DECK 2 Decks Personalized Playing Cards, Custom Deck of Cards- Family, Weddings, Fundraisers, Corporate Events (2 1/2" x 3 1/2")
features: A MEMENTO FOR ANY OCCASION: You're On Deck custom playing cards are a great way to commemorate weddings, bar/bat mitzvahs, graduations and anniversaries. Host a casino night for a corporate event or fundraiser using unique playing cards.

MADE TO LAST: These custom photo playing cards feature heavyweight 300 gsm card stock with a plastic UV gloss coating for durability. Use your favorite photos to create a fun keepsake deck, made for play and ready to shuffle right out of the box.

MAKE IT PERSONAL: Custom poker cards are the perfect gift idea for one person, group event favors, and business promotions. Each deck of personalized playing cards has a clear plastic protective box. Order in packs of 2, 10 or 50.
HAVE QUESTIONS ABOUT CUSTOMIZATION? Click the "See all buying options" button then “Your're On Deck” under Seller information.

ORDERING IS EASY: You're steps away from custom printed playing cards. Click the "Customize Now" button and upload a photo, design or logo. Choose a font style and color and add text. When done, checkout and the cards will be shipped to you.
description: Put a personal spin on the party, special occasion, and event favors with You're On Deck's custom playing cards. The unique playing cards can feature your favorite photo, graphic design, or company logo on the back of the cards. Custom printed playing cards make a great gift idea or party favor for birthdays, anniversaries, bar/bat mitzvahs, and corporate events. Host a casino night or give them away at tradeshows.

These regulation poker-size playing card decks are quality-crafted from heavyweight 300 gsm card stock. Our custom printed playing cards are durable, ready to shuffle, and perfect for card games like poker, bridge, euchre, crazy eights, go fish, gin rummy, and more. The corners of the cards are slightly rounded to ensure a comfortable feel in your hands with no sharp points. A glossy plastic UV coating on all our cards ensures your custom image is fade-resistant and looks clear and colorful after many hours of play. Each deck of cards comes in a white tuck box to preserve its condition and keep it together.

You're On Deck's personalized playing cards are ideal for commemorating family and group milestones, and they're perfect for the business world too. Put your company's name and logo and a relevant photo on our custom poker cards. Create a custom deck of cards to get your brand across in an impactful way. Unique cards with an image, illustration, or slogan are a great promotional item that potential clients and customers will keep for a long time. That's repeat exposure for your company's advertising. Need a few decks or a lot? You can order You're On Deck's personalized decks of cards in quantities of 2, 10, or 50.
If you have any questions about the customization process, please let us know by clicking
under Seller information. or contact our customer service team using the phone # provided.
